law.catch_line: Liability Of Partnership For Partnerâ€™S Misapplication Of Money Or Property

text.section: Where one partner acting within the scope of his apparent authority receives money or property of a third person and misapplies it; and

Where the partnership in the course of its business receives money or property of a third person and the money or property so received is misapplied by any partner while it is in the custody of the partnership.
